item.title: BLOGSITE-CREAT-NOTE
item.author: Author
item.description: I’ve jot down here the essentials of creating my first blog using Hugo for future reference.Even though there are a lot of resources and instructions on the Internet, it is still more convenient to view mine. [windows] INSTALL CHOCOLATE More info: https://chocolatey.org/ First, ensure that you are using an administrative shell - you can also install as a non-admin, check out Non-Administrative Installation. Install with powershell.exe
